description: Gordon Granja, located in Choele Choel, Argentina, is a pioneering agricultural initiative that emphasizes sustainable practices and community engagement. Founded in the late 1960s, it has evolved into a diversified operation producing a variety of crops, including onions, corn, and walnuts. The farm prioritizes local and international markets, fostering strong relationships with employees and the community. Its commitment to environmental sustainability and human capital development underpins its business model, ensuring resilience and growth in challenging conditions.
name: Gordon Granja
